content: **materials required ** * mercrochet 4 balls art 161 white *or* * daisy 3 skeins art 65 or 4 balls art 97 white * steel crochet hook no 13 **size** * in mercrochet chair back doily 12-1/2 x 16 inches arm rest doilies 8 x 11-3/4 inches * in daisy chair back 13-1/2 x 17 inches arm rest 9 x 13 inches **gauge ** in mercrochet 7 spaces and row = 1 inch in daisy 6 spaces and row = 1 inch
